oneWireWeather
Interface WeatherDataListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
StationLog, WeatherStatistics
public interface WeatherDataListener

This interface is implemented by a class that wants to be informed about changes to the weather station date. Interested listeners implement this interface and then register themselves with the weather station through the addWeatherDataListener() method.

Author:
Seth Cohen

Method Summary
 void notifyWeatherData(WeatherData data)
          This method is called after registering with the weather station, whenever the weather data changes.
 

Method Detail

notifyWeatherData

void notifyWeatherData(WeatherData data)
This method is called after registering with the weather station, whenever the weather data changes. This allows a class to implement this interface and be notified whenever the data changes in order to be able to properly react to those changes when they occur.

Parameters:
data - The new WeatherData value(s)
